# Nacos

### 

---

```xml
<dependency>
    <groupId>com.alibaba.cloud</groupId>
    <artifactId>spring-cloud-starter-alibaba-nacos-config</artifactId>
</dependency>
<dependency>
    <groupId>com.alibaba.cloud</groupId>
    <artifactId>spring-cloud-starter-alibaba-nacos-discovery</artifactId>
</dependency>
```

> discoveryconfig
>
> 
>
> 1. configbootstrap.ymlbootstrap.yml>application.yml
> 2.  

### 

---

```yml
spring:
  application:
    name: onedata
  cloud:
    nacos:
      discovery:
        server-addr: http://172.20.23.140:80
      config:
         server-addr: http://172.20.23.140:80
         group: DEFAULT_GROUP
         file-extension: yml
```



---

1bootstrap.yml,

```yml
spring:
  profiles:
    active: dev
```

2bootstrap-dev.ymlnacos

****

```yml
spring:
  application:
    name: mybatis-plus-join-practice
  #nacos
  cloud:
    nacos:
      discovery:
        server-addr: http://xxx:8848
        username: nacos
        password: nacos
        namespace: dev
        group: MYBATIS-PLUS-JOIN-PRACTICE
      config:
        server-addr: ${spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.server-addr}
        username: ${spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.username}
        password: ${spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.password}
        namespace: ${spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.namespace}
        file-extension: yml  # yaml
        extension-configs:
          - data-id: application.yml
            group: ${spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.group}
            refresh: true
 
          - data-id: datasource.yml
```
```yaml
            group: ${spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.group}
            refresh: true
```

# nginx rtsp

 Nginx  RTSP  nginx-rtsp-module

###  1: 

 Ubuntu 

```
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install build-essential libpcre3-dev
```

###  2:  Nginx 

1.  nginx-rtsp-module 

    ```
    git clone https://github.com/arut/nginx-rtsp-module.git
    ```
2.  Nginx 

    ```
    wget http://nginx.org/download/nginx-1.21.3.tar.gz
    tar -zxvf nginx-1.21.3.tar.gz
    cd nginx-1.21.3
    ```
3.  nginx-rtsp-module

    ```
    ./configure --add-module=../nginx-rtsp-module
    ```
4. 

    ```
    make
    sudo make install
    ```

###  3:  Nginx

 Nginx  RTSP 

```
rtsp {
    listen 8554;
    server_name localhost;

    auth_basic "Restricted";
    auth_basic_user_file /etc/nginx/.htpasswd;

    access_log /var/log/nginx/rtsp_access.log;
    error_log /var/log/nginx/rtsp_error.log;

    location / {
        rtsp_server all;
        rtsp_publish all;
    }
}
```

###  4: 



```
sudo htpasswd -c /etc/nginx/.htpasswd username
```

###  5: 

 8554 

```
sudo ufw allow 8554/tcp
```



```
sudo firewall-cmd --add-port=8554/tcp --permanent
sudo firewall-cmd --reload
```

###  6: 

 Nginx 

```
sudo nginx -t
sudo systemctl restart nginx
```

###  7:  RTSP 

 VLC 

1.  VLC -\> 
2.  `rtsp://localhost:8554/test` 

### 

 RTMP  RTMP 

```
rtsp {
    listen 8554;
    server_name localhost;

    location /rtsp {
        rtsp_server all;
        rtsp_publish all;

        rtmp {
            server 127.0.0.1:1935;
        }
    }
}

http {
    ...
    rtmp {
        server {
            listen 1935;
            chunk_size 4096;

            application live {
                live on;
            }
        }
    }
    ...
}
```

###

# nginx webdav

##  Nginx  WebDAV 

 Nginx  WebDAV  Nginx  WebDAV 

### 1.  Nginx  WebDAV 

Nginx  WebDAV  `http_dav_module`  Nginx  Nginx 

 Nginx  `http_dav_module` 

```
nginx -V 2>&1 | grep -o with-http_dav_module
```

 `with-http_dav_module` Nginx 

### 2.  Nginx  WebDAV

 Nginx  `/etc/nginx/nginx.conf`  `/etc/nginx/sites-available/default`

```
server {
    listen 80;
    server_name your_domain.com;

    location /webdav {
        root /path/to/webdav/storage;
        autoindex on;
        dav_methods PUT DELETE MKCOL COPY MOVE;
        dav_ext_methods PROPFIND PROPPATCH MKACTIVITY CHECKOUT;
        dav_access user:rw group:rw all:r;
        create_full_path on;

        # 
        auth_basic "WebDAV Authentication";
        auth_basic_user_file /etc/nginx/.htpasswd;
    }
}
```

****

* `root /path/to/webdav/storage;` WebDAV 
* `dav_methods`  `dav_ext_methods` WebDAV 
* `dav_access`
* `create_full_path`
* `auth_basic`  `auth_basic_user_file`

### 3. 

 WebDAV 

```
sudo mkdir -p /path/to/webdav/storage
sudo chown -R www-data:www-data /path/to/webdav/storage
sudo chmod -R 755 /path/to/webdav/storage
```

### 4. 



```
sudo htpasswd -c /etc/nginx/.htpasswd username
```

****   `username` 

### 5.  Nginx 

 Nginx 

```
sudo nginx -t
```

 Nginx 

```
sudo systemctl restart nginx
```



```
sudo service nginx restart
```

### 6.  WebDAV 

 `cadaver`  WebDAV 

```
sudo apt-get install cadaver
cadaver http://your_domain.com/webdav
```



### 7. 

 HTTP 80 HTTPS 443

```
sudo ufw allow 80/tcp
```



```
sudo firewall-cmd --permanent --add-service=http
sudo firewall-cmd --reload
```

### 8.

Post.title: Docker-Compose
Post._content:
# -docker-compose

## 

```docker-compose
version: "3.9"
services:
  siyuan:
    image: b3log/siyuan
    container_name: siyuan
    user: root
    command: ['--workspace=/siyuan/workspace/', '--accessAuthCode=Qsxzxc123@']
    environment:
      - TZ=Asia/Shanghai
    ports:
      - 6806:6806
    volumes:
      - ./workspace:/siyuan/workspace
    restart: always
```

## [github.com/appdev/siyuan-unlock](https://github.com/appdev/siyuan-unlock)unlook()

```bash
# 
docker network create mynet
# 
mkdir SiYuan
# docker-compose.yml
touch docker-compose.yml

# 
docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up -d

# ip http:IP:6806
```

```js
version: "3.9"
services:
  siyuan:
#    image: b3log/siyuan
    image: apkdv/siyuan-unlock
    container_name: siyuan
    user: root  # 
    command: ['--workspace=/siyuan/SiYuan/', '--accessAuthCode=yourAccessAuthCode']
    environment:
      - TZ=Asia/Shanghai
    ports:
      - 6806:6806
    volumes:
      - ./SiYuan:/siyuan/SiYuan
    restart: always
    networks:
      - mynet
networks:
  mynet:
    external: true
```

Post.title: mysql
Post._content:
# mysql

 MySQL 

---

###  `RIGHT()` 

#### 

```sql
SELECT * 
FROM users 
WHERE RIGHT(phone_number, 4) = '5678';
```

#### 

* ****4
* **** `RIGHT()` `phone_number` 
* ****

---

###  `LIKE` 

#### 

```sql
SELECT * 
FROM users 
WHERE phone_number LIKE '%5678';
```

#### 

* **** `%` 4
* **** `%`  `LIKE` 
* ****

---

###  `REGEXP`

#### 

```sql
SELECT * 
FROM users 
WHERE phone_number REGEXP '5678$';
```

#### 

* ****
* ****
* ****

---

###  + 

 **Generated Column**  

#### 

1. ****MySQL 5.7+ 

    ```sql
    ALTER TABLE users
    ADD COLUMN last_four CHAR(4) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (RIGHT(phone_number, 4)) VIRTUAL;
    ```
2. ****

    ```sql
    CREATE INDEX idx_last_four ON users(last_four);
    ```
3. ****

    ```sql
    SELECT * 
    FROM users 
    WHERE last_four = '5678';
    ```

#### 

* ****
* **** `VIRTUAL` 

---

###  + 

 MySQL 5.6 

#### 

1. ****

    ```sql
    ALTER TABLE users 
    ADD COLUMN last_four CHAR(4);
    ```
2. ****

    ```sql
    UPDATE users 
    SET last_four = RIGHT(phone_number, 4);
    ```
3. ****

    ```sql
    CREATE INDEX idx_last_four ON users(last_four);
    ```
4. ****


     ```verilog
     // BAR0256MB64BAR/
     // 'bar_hit[0]'BAR0PCIe
     // 'req_addr'PCIe
     // 'req_be'TLP
     // 'req_data'
     // 'rsp_data'

     // BAR0256MB (2^28) [27:0] BAR
     localparam BAR0_SIZE_BITS = 28; // 2^28 = 256MB

     reg [31:0] internal_register_0; // BAR0
     reg [31:0] internal_register_1; // 

     assign bar0_offset = req_addr[BAR0_SIZE_BITS-1:0]; // BAR0

     always_comb begin
         // 
         rsp_data = 32'hFFFFFFFF; // F

         if (bar_hit[0]) begin // BAR0
             if (req_write) begin // 
                 case (bar0_offset)
                     // 0x0internal_register_0
                     32'h0000_0000: begin
                         if (req_be[3]) internal_register_0[31:24] = req_data[31:24];
                         if (req_be[2]) internal_register_0[23:16] = req_data[23:16];
                         if (req_be[1]) internal_register_0[15:8]  = req_data[15:8];
                         if (req_be[0]) internal_register_0[7:0]   = req_data[7:0];
                     end
                     // 0x4internal_register_1
                     32'h0000_0004: begin
                         if (req_be[3]) internal_register_1[31:24] = req_data[31:24];
                         if (req_be[2]) internal_register_1[23:16] = req_data[23:16];
                         if (req_be[1]) internal_register_1[15:8]  = req_data[15:8];
                         if (req_be[0]) internal_register_1[7:0]   = req_data[7:0];
                     end
                     // BRAM
                     default: begin
                         // BAR0
                     end
                 endcase
             end else if (req_read) begin // 
                 case (bar0_offset)
                     // internal_register_0
                     32'h0000_0000: rsp_data = internal_register_0;
                     // internal_register_1
                     32'h0000_0004: rsp_data = internal_register_1;
                     // BRAM
                     default: begin
                         rsp_data = 32'h0; // 0
                     end
                 endcase
             end
         end
     end
     ```

       ```verilog
       // 
       // AXI-StreamTLPFIFO
       function automatic [95:0] create_3dw_tlp_header; // 3 = 96
           input logic [7:0] tlp_type_fmt;   // 
           input logic [15:0] requester_id;  // BDF
           input logic [7:0] tag;
           input logic [7:0] lower_address_bits; // 
           input logic [7:0] byte_enables;   // 

           begin
               create_3dw_tlp_header = {
                   tlp_type_fmt,                     // Fmt[6:4], Type[3:0]
                   8'b0,                             // 
                   4'b0,                             // TC[3:0] ()
                   3'b0,                             // Attr[2:0]
                   1'b0,                             // TH (TLP)
                   2'b0,                             // D(igest) (ECRC)
                   1'b0,                             // EP (Poisoned)
                   1'b0,                             // TD ()
                   // DW0: Fmt, Type, TC, Attr, TH, D, EP, TD, Length (3DW, 4DW)

                   requester_id,                     // ID (Bus[7:0], Device[4:0], Function[2:0])
                   tag,                              // 
                   lower_address_bits,               // 
                   byte_enables,                     // 
                   4'b0,                             // 
                   4'b0                              //  (MWr)
                   // DW1, DW2... 
               };
           end
       endfunction

       // CplD
       // 
       localparam  CPLD_3DW_FMT = 8'h4A; // Fmt=100 (4DW, ), Type=1010 (Cpl)
       localparam  CPL_D_FMT_TYPE_LEN = 8'h4A; // PCIe(4DW)

       // ... TLP
       // CplD
       if (tx_ready_from_pcie_core) begin
           // 
           // CplDCompliter ID, Status, Byte Count, Requester ID, Tag, Completion ID, Lower Address
           // 
           m_axis_tx_tdata_reg = {
               CPL_D_FMT_TYPE_LEN,         // 0: Fmt/Type
               tlp_length_dw_minus_one,    // 1: TLP () - 1
               status_completion_bits,     // 2: Cpl Status, BCM, Rsvd
               byte_count_dws_upper,       // 3:  ()
               requester_id,               // 4-5: ID (MRd)
               tag,                        // 6:  (MRd)
               byte_count_dws_lower,       // 7:  ()
               completion_id,              // 8-9: ID (BDF)
               lower_address_from_request  // 10-11: 
               // ... 
           };
           m_axis_tx_tvalid_reg = 1'b1;
           m_axis_tx_tlast_reg = 1'b1; // TLP
           // ... tready
       end
       ```

     ```verilog
                         if (req_be[3]) internal_register_0[31:24] = req_data[31:24];
                         if (req_be[2]) internal_register_0[23:16] = req_data[23:16];
                         if (req_be[1]) internal_register_0[15:8]  = req_data[15:8];
                         if (req_be[0]) internal_register_0[7:0]   = req_data[7:0];

                         if (req_be[3]) internal_register_1[31:24] = req_data[31:24];

                         if (req_be[1]) internal_register_1[15:8]  = req_data[15:8];
                         if (req_be[0]) internal_register_1[7:0]   = req_data[7:0];

                     // BRAM
                     default: begin
                         // BAR0
                     end

                     // internal_register_0
                     32'h0000_0000: rsp_data = internal_register_0;
                     // internal_register_1
                     32'h0000_0004: rsp_data = internal_register_1;
                     // BRAM
                     default: begin
                         rsp_data = 32'h0; // 0
                     end
                 endcase
             end
         end
     ```

       ```verilog
       // 
       // AXI-StreamTLPFIFO
       function automatic [95:0] create_3dw_tlp_header; // 3 = 96
           input logic [7:0] tlp_type_fmt;   // 
           input logic [15:0] requester_id;  // BDF
           input logic [7:0] tag;
           input logic [7:0] lower_address_bits; // 
           input logic [7:0] byte_enables;   // 

           begin
               create_3dw_tlp_header = {
                   tlp_type_fmt,                     // Fmt[6:4], Type[3:0]
                   8'b0,                             // 
                   4'b0,                             // TC[3:0] ()
                   3'b0,                             // Attr[2:0]
                   1'b0,                             // TH (TLP)
                   2'b0,                             // D(igest) (ECRC)
                   1'b0,                             // EP (Poisoned)
                   1'b0,                             // TD ()
                   // DW0: Fmt, Type, TC, Attr, TH, D, EP, TD, Length (3DW, 4DW)

                   requester_id,                     // ID (Bus[7:0], Device[4:0], Function[2:0])
                   tag,                              // 
                   lower_address_bits,               // 
                   byte_enables,                     // 
                   4'b0,                             // 
                   4'b0                              //  (MWr)
                   // DW1, DW2... 
               };
           end
       endfunction

       // CplD
       // 
       localparam  CPLD_3DW_FMT = 8'h4A; // Fmt=100 (4DW, ), Type=1010 (Cpl)
       localparam  CPL_D_FMT_TYPE_LEN = 8'h4A; // PCIe(4DW)

       // ... TLP
       // CplD
       if (tx_ready_from_pcie_core) begin
           // 
           // CplDCompliter ID, Status, Byte Count, Requester ID, Tag, Completion ID, Lower Address
           // 
           m_axis_tx_tdata_reg = {
               CPL_D_FMT_TYPE_LEN,         // 0: Fmt/Type
               tlp_length_dw_minus_one,    // 1: TLP () - 1
               status_completion_bits,     // 2: Cpl Status, BCM, Rsvd
               byte_count_dws_upper,       // 3:  ()
       ```
